schema.title: Specify Assignee And Approver For Tasks
schema.description: Following Tasks will be created based on the Asset Change Type Activity. Please assign suitable users for each task. The users will get notifications and the tasks will be assigned accordingly.

inputVariables.name: identifySecurityControl
inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Identify Security Control
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Identify Impacted CIP-005 & CIP-007 Security Control.

inputVariables.label: Assignee For Task: Verify Software Source

step_variables.tagList: {% set tags = [] %}{% for asset in vars.assetIRI %}{% set _ = tags.append((asset | fromIRI).hostname) %}{% endfor %}{% set _ = tags.extend(("OT IT", "Asset Change Activity", "High Impact Baseline Change")) %}{{tags}}

routes.name: Assignee Implement Change -> Assignee Verify Security Controls
Assignment And Approver Name -> Do Nothing
routes.label: Cancel

routes.name: Assignee Identify Security Control -> Assignee Verify Software Source
Check Approver 3 -> Copy of Assignee Approval To Implement
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Assignee Approval To Implement -> Copy of Check Approver 2
Assignee Verify Security Controls -> Assignee Update Baseline
Get Relationship -> Assignment And Approver Name
Copy 1 of Is Approver Assigned -> Copy 1 of Approver Approval To Implement
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Copy of Assignee Approval To Implement -> Copy 1 of Is Approver Assigned
Verify Software Source -> Assignee Approval To Test
Approver Approval To Test -> Test Security Controls
Test Security Controls -> Assignee Approval To Implement
Approver Approval To Implement -> Implement Change
Is Approver Assigned to test -> Test Security Controls
routes.label: No

routes.name: Assignee And Approver Name -> Activity In Process
routes.label: Add Task

routes.name: Activity In Process -> Identify Security Control
